General.Name: Fountain Asset Corp
General.Description: Fountain Asset Corp. provides various merchant banking services to small and mid-size companies in public and private markets in North America. The company offers debt and equity financing, asset-based lending, mergers and acquisitions advisory, and operational management support services, as well as facilitates various debt and equity financing structures. It serves manufacturing, retail, financial services, technology, cannabis, biotechnology, oil and gas, mining, and cryptocurrency sectors. The company was formerly known as GC-Global Capital Corp. and changed its name to Fountain Asset Corp. in August 2015. Fountain Asset Corp. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 3 Market Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5E 0A3
